summary: Implemented a single-page React gift-box experience with gradient background, click-triggered animation state machine, floating heart background, and Web Speech API voice with a user-gesture fallback prompt. However, required generated art assets are not present in the diff, and additional authentication/actor/react-query infrastructure was introduced despite being out of scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add any required custom art as static assets (not served through the backend) and reference them from the frontend. Any generated images are placed under frontend/public/assets/generated and loaded directly by the frontend.
missing_requirements.reason: The frontend references generated image paths (e.g., heart icon), but the diff does not include any added image files under frontend/public/assets/generated (or anywhere). Therefore the required custom art assets are not implemented/shipped in this change set.
evidence: File diff summary shows only code/text files added; no frontend/public/assets/generated images listed

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication context/provider and identity-aware actor creation hooks (implying auth/login capability).
hallucinated_features.reason: User accounts/authentication flows are explicitly listed as non-goals; these hooks/providers introduce authentication infrastructure that is not requested for the gift-box experience.

hallucinated_features.description: React Query client/provider setup and actor/identity query invalidation logic.
hallucinated_features.reason: No backend calls are needed for the requested experience; adding React Query and related query invalidation/actor-fetching logic is not requested and adds extra app complexity.

hallucinated_features.description: Use of lucide-react icon components (Volume2/VolumeX) for UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; UI could be implemented without adding/using an icon library.
